column5: I've really struggled this season so far on simcoe. I have put in 5 days of hard fishing and not a decent fish to show for it.  I've bin all over my usual early ice haunts with no success.  Il be out next week for another three days and I'm comfotably gonna bring the snow machine on the main lake basin to hit some main lake basin waypoints.  Straight of BBP rd.   6 inches as far as the eye can see, (and your willing to walk) the shorelines busted up.  Mapleview rd.  6-8 inches.   All the way to the islands.   LOTS of cracks be carefull on quads
Yep keep your head up.  But this weekend should be ok for hard ice.  Look out for presure craks. they dont seem to be in the usual places??  Don.
I was out off Beaverton on Sunday and never saw less than 10' of ice fishing was slow one laker and 2 whitefish in a sun up to sun down adventure with over 130 holes drilled  Dan
No wonder you didn't catch any fish, you were drilling holes all day!  LOL!
Anyone been out north west of Georgina?
I heard there's ten feet of ice off beaverton!
